content:
The rooftop pool at The Berkeley is definitely one of its most standout features. With its spectacular panoramic views of central London, it's a picturesque location to relax and unwind. However, whether it's worth staying there just for the pool really depends on your personal preferences and priorities for a hotel stay. 

If you prioritize luxurious amenities and enjoy spending time relaxing by the pool, then The Berkeley's rooftop pool might be a fantastic choice for you. However, if you're looking for other things to do in the hotel, such as fine dining or spa treatments, it's worth considering if The Berkeley would fulfill your expectations.

Overall, The Berkeley is a great hotel that offers a range of luxurious amenities in addition to the rooftop pool, so it could be worth considering for your stay in London.
